statements: SELECT * FROM venue_information;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM venue_information;
SELECT * FROM venue_information WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM venue_information ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venue_information WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venue_information WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM venue_information WHERE capacity <= 1000 AND location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT venue_name, capacity, location FROM venue_information WHERE venue_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venue_information WHERE capacity BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY venue_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_venues FROM venue_information
SELECT * FROM venue_capacity;
SELECT venue_id, venue_name FROM venue_capacity WHERE seating_capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE venue_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(seating_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM venue_capacity;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, seating_capacity FROM venue_capacity WHERE seating_capacity >= 100 ORDER BY seating_capacity DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM event_schedule JOIN venue_capacity ON event_schedule.venue_id = venue_capacity.venue_id;
SELECT venue_name, SUM(seating_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM venue_capacity GROUP BY venue_name HAVING total_capacity > 200;
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM Venue WHERE venue_capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, event_name, broadcast_time FROM Venue JOIN Event ON Venue.venue_id = Event.venue_id JOIN Broadcast ON Event.event_id = Broadcast.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Broadcast WHERE broadcast_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM Venue WHERE venue_capacity > 500;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, event_name, broadcast_time FROM Venue JOIN Event ON Venue.venue_id = Event.venue_id JOIN Broadcast ON Event.event_id = Broadcast.event_id WHERE broadcast_duration > 120;
SELECT venue_name, event_date FROM Event JOIN Venue ON Event.venue_id = Venue.venue_id WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Hall%';

SELECT broadcast_id, venue_name, event_name, broadcast_time, broadcast_duration FROM Broadcast JOIN Event ON Broadcast.event_id = Event.event_id JOIN Venue ON Event.venue_id = Venue.venue_id WHERE venue_name = 'Stadium A' ORDER BY broadcast_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM venue_capacity;
SELECT venue_name, seating_capacity FROM venue_capacity ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM event_schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT broadcast_name, broadcast_date FROM live_sports_broadcasts WHERE broadcast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ar_visualization FROM augmented_reality_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM venue_capacity;
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, seating_capacity FROM venue_capacity WHERE seating_capacity > 100 ORDER BY seating_capacity DESC;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM event_schedules WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT broadcast_name, broadcast_date FROM live_sports_broadcasts WHERE broadcast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY broadcast_date DESC;
SELECT ar_visualization, ar_audio FROM augmented_reality_data WHERE broadcast_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM venue_capacity ORDER BY seating_capacity DESC;
SELECT venue_name, seating_capacity FROM venue_capacity WHERE seating_capacity > 500;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM event_schedules WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT broadcast_id, broadcast_date, broadcast_url FROM live_broadcasts WHERE broadcast_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM venue_capacity ORDER BY venue_name DESC, seating_capacity ASC;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM event_schedules WHERE venue_id = 1 AND start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT event_name, broadcast_date, broadcast_url FROM event_schedules JOIN live_broadcasts ON event_schedules.event_id = live_broadcasts.event_id WHERE broadcast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT broadcast_id, viewers, average_duration FROM viewership_stats WHERE viewers > 1000 AND average_duration < '01:00:00';
